properties.entry: SELECT A.ORDER_ADD_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , C.GOODS_NO , D.GOODS_NAME , C.AMOUNT_COUNT , D.GOODS_PRICE , C.ORDER_GOODS_PRICE , E.DELIVERY_TYPE , B.ORDER_TITLE , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.RECIEVER_NAME , A.RECIEVER_PHONE , A.RECIEVER_ADDRESS FROM MG_ORDER_ADDRESS A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_ADD_NO = B.ORDER_NO) JOIN MG_ORDER_GOODS C ON ( A.ORDER_ADD_NO = C.ORDER_NO) JOIN MG_GOODS D ON (C.GOODS_NO = D.GOODS_NO) JOIN MG_ORDER_DELIVERY E ON (A.ORDER_ADD_NO = E.ORDER_NO)
SELECT A.MEMBER_POINT FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
